biotools.summary: PRALINE 2 is a framework for tailor-made sequence alignments. It allows almost all aspects of a sequence alignment algorithm to be customised, such as the alphabets used (AA, DNA, secondary structure, disorder, motif matches, etc.). Includes a command-line tool for common use cases without writing any custom code.

bioschemas.name: PRALINE 2
